alert.note: Alert for Bell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:53PM EDT until May 19 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BELL...NORTHEASTERN KNOX AND SOUTHEASTERN CLAY COUNTIES... At 452 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Walker, or 7 miles north of Pineville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Erose, Beverly and Gardner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
